name: GB-Denn
description:
An unfinished project about demake Steredenn game

Want to do it for the GBJam6 and DemakeJam ...

But i cannot finish in time due to some real life things to manage !

Still lot of work to do ... player collision, new weapons, new ennemies, boss IA, sounds ... I will perhaps continue after ...  but i want to submit something anyway

How to play :

Arrow to move
X to fire
C to change weapons

Techno :

Love2d
PyxelEdit


https://github.com/Nakato53/gb-denn
